website_summaries.verdict: Ships with a few extra items versus some other kits, so it provides a good value.
pros: Kit includes 4 different styles of threads, allowing you to practice multiple stitches
You'll also receive a reference guide to help you learn various techniques
Entire kit ships inside a carrying case
Suture pad has a realistic feel for human skin
cons: Tools in this kit could have a better build quality to provide longevity

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: To all potential buyers: Do NOT buy this. The instruments are cheap. I received the product in the mail today and after my third attempt at a suture the tip of the needle driver broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Hadassah

customer_reviews.title: Tears apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to practice suturing at home but this set comes with reverse cutting needles which tears through this material easily. The tears make it hard to reuse the “wounds” and renders this useless for long term practice. I also wish that the tissue pick ups did not have such a sharp “tooth”, it also contributes to damage. Overall, this is useful for practice but it gets damaged easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kay28

customer_reviews.title: Great suture practice pad
customer_reviews.text: This suture pad is definitely one of the best out there. As with all suture pads, it isn't as deep as real skin and doesn't have the same strength/integrity, but it's high quality material. I would recommend this product for someone who is looking for a suture pad and equipment to practice with, but keep in mind nothing compares to the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: howhandy

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for PA school
customer_reviews.text: This suture kit comes with everything you need to practice suturing. I really love the information card that comes with this kit (different types of closures with an explanation of which kind of suture to use for certain procedures). I used this kit after my general surgery rotation for Physician Assistant school and I feel like my skills are slowly improving. I will be heading back into the operating room later this summer and I cannot wait to apply my new capabilities. Thank you SutureSkills! - @jazminek_pa
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Kwong, PA-S

customer_reviews.title: without practice, suturing is not easy.
customer_reviews.text: We don't go on our quad ridding trips without a suture kit. in the years that our family has been ridding we have had multiple occasions that lacerations that needed mending could not wait for a professional. I purchased this kit because it's time for me to hand that job to someone else and it's just the perfect practice kit to be confident enough to stick a needle and thread through a another human being skin. without practice it's not pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: PA by Day Suture Kit Review
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product! The pre-cut skin is a great practice tool. The variety within the package of several different types of sutures, needle driver, cutting blades, and suture technique skills card are all perfect for beginners to get started and really start feeling comfortable with their skills. It would be a great gift for students and practicing clinicians will be impressed with the quality of materials! - PAbyday.com , visit our Amazon storefront for more great finds :)
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Sew what
customer_reviews.text: This pack is fully loaded. After about an hour of practice i became an expert. Ive been sewing individual chicken breasts into pairs for days now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian michaelg gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great for medical professionals!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely great suture kit for individuals who are in the medical field or pursuing a profession in the medical field. I work as a PA and wanted to improve on my suturing skills both inpatient and in the OR. I've tried my fair share of suture kits, so I have to say that this suture pad material is the best and I like how it comes with so many different kinds of suture material that I can practice with. Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Crayola

customer_reviews.title: SO helpfull!
customer_reviews.text: I am an aspiring PA and this is exactly what I was looking for! It comes with absolutely EVERYTHING you could possibly need and is super durable. I've been using it for a while and there is no sign of any wear and tear. The online videos are incredibly helpful and I feel like I'm really getting the hang of it! I also really like that there are the different layers to represent skin, fat, and muscle to make it closer to the real thing. So excited about my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Miller

customer_reviews.title: Passion for delivering a Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit with quality, clean materials and easy to follow directions (visual). Product contained all specified pieces in an extremely organized manner. I am more than proud but also very satisfied with my purchase. I highly recommend the Suture Practice Tool Kit, you will be more than happy but excited to start learning on the wound pad no matter your background.
customer_reviews.author: Sicily

customer_reviews.title: Sew them up
customer_reviews.text: Durable- thick. Kinda crazy to get this but it definitely something to pass the time. Never expect to have to sew someone up but hey, “ either you’re prepared or your not!”
customer_reviews.author: Aaron I.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! This product is a STEAL!
customer_reviews.text: This product has everything you need! My suturing skills have improved so much by using this product in such a short period of time. I recommend it to all PA students and any other health professional students who need practice with suturing. The materials are very durable and worth the money! I cannot wait to see how much this suturing kit helps me in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Totally recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this pad for a few months now and I love it! It comes with enough sutures to practice and a very handy pocket card with suturing info. I think it has a great quality and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: HealthyMode.PA

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase and Amazing Kit!
customer_reviews.text: This suture kit is everything you need!!! Arrived on time and the packaging was great. High-quality instruments and silicon skin pad with individually packed silk sutures. The tutorial videos are amazing and easy to follow along! 100% recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sohaib J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for ALL!
customer_reviews.text: As an aspiring PA, I was looking for any way to try and get ahead before entering PA school. I was initially concerned since I haven’t had any formal training in suturing, but the online training videos that accompany this kit were great! The instruments come neatly packed in case and the varying sizes of wounds on the skin pad are also very helpful. I feel very prepared for once I finally go through suture training in school.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Well overall I like it. The material gets ripped easily so i think you can not use it more than once bc nothing will really hold.
customer_reviews.author: Batt Chrissi

customer_reviews.title: Must have suture kit for future clinicians/ current clinicians!
customer_reviews.text: I have been through a couple of suture kits already attempting to find one that can hold any type of suture I want to practice and finally came across this one! I love practicing a variety of sutures but most suture kits won't hold the suture in place, so it is hard to tell how your progress is going. In this picture I was attempting a running subcuticular suture and it was holding perfectly. I am currently in my clinical rotations and I would recommend this kit to any PA/medical student who wants to get some good quality practice in!
customer_reviews.author: Dyana L.

customer_reviews.title: Tears very easily. Terrible for practicing subcuticular sutures.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a new PA in a surgical subspecialty so I could practice my sutures at home. However, the wounds/incisions on the pad tear VERY easily. I can't even throw a proper inverted interrupted without ripping through the sides of the incisions. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Dohlman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been looking at this for some time. She is a Nurse Practioner and asked for it as a gift. Therefore the best I can say that it is what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Spiderweb

customer_reviews.title: The best suture kit money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: As a former PA student and now practicing PA in orthopedic surgery, I’ve tried a few different suture kits. This one, by far, surpasses the competition. From the quality of the suture pad to the informative pocket guide on types of closures AND various types of real-life suture to get you accustomed to handling a monofilament vs a nylon, for example, this is the kit for you!
customer_reviews.author: Braedon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this kit and was impressed with the quality of the tools and of the “skin” pad. It also comes with a suture guide which definitely helps me to practice the stitches. Highly recommend to future health professionals who are currently in school and training how to put in stitches!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: As a current PA student, I think that this kit is amazing and it is helping me prepare for my clinical skills! Definitely worth it for the price, considering the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jocethony

customer_reviews.title: Best learning tool for pre-health students!
customer_reviews.text: As a pre-medical student, I found that I have learned more from physically attempting to suture with this kit than any video I have ever watched. This product has everything I need and I have learned so much already! I recommend it to all my medical and pre-health students who need practice with suturing. The actual suturing pad is so durable and I have used it over 10+ times without much wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Brutsky

customer_reviews.title: Suture kit
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonable price. I haven’t had time to try yet but it seems user friendly
customer_reviews.author: marranita

customer_reviews.title: Great, reusable suture kit!
customer_reviews.text: An insanely good suture kit! It comes with so many sutures and the kit is reusable. As a dental student, it’s super helpful for me to experiment different suture techniques and to get extra practice. A perfect gift for your PA/doctor/dentist friend. Or a gift to yourself! :)

customer_reviews.title: Useful for vet student
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter. She is in her first year of vet school and wants to be able to practice as often as possible. This kit has really been helpful to her. I couldn’t decide between several available kits but she is very satisfied with this one.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practice
customer_reviews.text: As a PA student, this suture kit was super helpful in helping me practice my knots and ties. I loved how all the instruments were included as well as different forms of the sutures. Also love how there were different types of laceration shapes. Would definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone in the medical field who is learning to suture
customer_reviews.text: This kit has absolutely everything you need to learn how to suture and at a price you will not find anywhere (trust me I looked). As a PA student it has increased my proficiency with suturing and I loved the quick guide that came with the kit.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Doctors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a doctor, and really loves that she can practice her stitches in that kit.

customer_reviews.title: Good for practicing.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product cause it really taught me how to suture well and how to begin. I wanna be a doctor in the near future and this helped reinforce my motivation to be the BEST doctor in the world.

customer_reviews.title: Great suture kit
customer_reviews.text: GreAt suture kit, has everything needed to practice and really good tools and guide

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practicing
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for suture practice nurse practitioner/ PA students. This kit includes different size and material sutures, which is helpful to get a sense of how each of the threads feel.

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Wife (R.N.) loves the kit to practice and further educate her self with.

customer_reviews.text: Loved using this kit for practice, I taught myself to use the forceps with one hand and now I’m working at being ambidextrous!! Provided with plenty of suture material and needles. The fleshy material is extremely realistic feeling and durable!

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for students
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the kit quite yet but everything included seems high quality, especially the practice pad. The kit includes all the basic tools to learn from. I really like the video tutorials as well. Very helpful over all

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and I am so happy with it. Amazing quality and you get the bank for the buck. So great. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great suture kit to practice on
customer_reviews.text: Superb suture kit!! I am a medical student who can use a bit of practice in my suturing technique and this is very helpful. It comes with different types of sutures, blades, needle driver and scissors. Totally recommend buying if you need some practice!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this suture kit! It is very complete and has a lot of really great resources included for the novice suture-er. As an ER PA, I am always looking to brush up on my suturing skills, and this kit is perfect for me to do so!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kit! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This practice kit was exactly as described. I’m an NP student, and this helped me perfect my suturing skills. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!! Perfect for any level. I would recommend it to anybody!

customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the product and I get a chance to practice over and over

customer_reviews.text: What I like is that I can practice ahead of time into becoming a surgical assistant. The only thing about the quality of the “skin” is it rips easily.

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy. Great tool for learning a skill
customer_reviews.text: High quality parts and tools. I will purchase this again.

product_meta.title: Suture Practice 29 Piece Tool Kit | Online How To Suture Video Course | Sutures Training Manual | Doctor, Nurse, Surgeon, Dentist, Veterinary, Medical Student, Practice Pad and Teaching Supplies
product_meta.description:
Suturing is a fundamental medical skill, yet why are students made to practice on materials that only vaguely mimic real skin?

For all the advancements in the surgical field, suture practice is still outdated. Many medical students still poke at bananas, orange peels, and pig’s feet. Besides being a waste of perfectly good fruit, none of the popular practice methods prepare students for the real feel and texture of live skin.

Leave the fruits in the basket. Learn from the closest approximation of skin with Suture Skills’ Suture Practice Tool Kit.

Sure, it’s easy to claim a silicone suture pad as lifelike. But our suture pad is an original, designed by medical professionals for the medical community. Our pad feels as authentic as it gets without practicing on your buddy.

A practice suture pad undergoes some serious trauma. That’s why we’ve inserted a mesh between the fat and skin layers to improve durability. The mesh layer is thin, but strong enough to prevent tearing and ripping for up to 100 uses.

We are genuinely dedicated to helping you improve your suture skills. That’s why learning with us doesn’t stop at the suture kit. We have online training videos, tutorial posts on Instagram (follow us at @sutureskills), and a guide. Our guide is pocket-sized, so you can take lessons you’ve learned from practice with you during hospital rotations. It’s also laminated, so you can safely use it in any location without fear of staining or creasing it.

Not convinced yet? Here are more perks that come with the Suture Skills Suture Practice Tool Kit:

✅ Additional space on pad for custom style cuts.
✅ Portable and sleek black carrying case with zipper.
✅ Great gift for loved ones in the medical field.

Keep practicing for the suture lines you’ve always wanted. Hone your skills with the Suture Skills Suture Practice Tool Kit TODAY!
feature_bullets: ✅ ALL THE TOOLS YOU NEED - Includes reusable pad with 14 wounds, 16 suture threads, Adson forceps, Mosquito forceps, Hegar needle holder, Iris scissors, 5 scalpel blades, and a scalpel handle.
✅ FEELS LIKE THE REAL THING - Pads are made with silicone, a material that closely mimics human & animal skin. They come in 3 layers to accurately imitate skin, fat, and muscle tissue.

✅ EXTENSIVE THREAD SELECTION - Kit comes with 4 different types and sizes of threads, where other kits only come with 2 kinds. Includes polypropylene, nylon, silk, and polyester threads from size 3/0 to 5/0.
✅ ACCESSIBLE EDUCATION - Our kit includes a handy reference guide for suture techniques and best practices. It covers the basics of suturing, from needle handling techniques to removal timing.
✅ DYNAMIC TRAINING MATERIALS -We’ve uploaded multiple step-by-step online training videos that cover everything from knot tying to the technically challenging subcuticular running suture.
